name: Eternity (Silas_Silence)
description:
Since this is for a Game Jam, I didn't want to leave the game part out. So I came up with a little idea for a game and let that inspire my compositions. Therefor, all themes strive to provoke some sort of unsettling feelings.

It was composed an arranged in FL-Studio, heavily utilizing Native Instrument's Kontakt.

Genre:  Orchestral (?)

Music length (total):  05:49 minutes

Eternity  - 00:27 (loopable)

Some interesting chord motion with a 'waving' reverb. Was your mind ever just standing still?

The Forest's Whispers  - 02:31 (loopable)

It's really relaxing to listen to a forest, but it  can also be  quite unsettling.

Carving Cold  - 01:54  (loopable)

Ever had a cold shiver running down your spine? That's nothing coming from actual temperature, but the way you feel. After some time, the burden of some emotions might just carve into you - just   like the cold.

Breakout - 00:57 (loopable)

Sooner or later you'll have to face some traumatizing  events. While you might collapse as a result, it's what's in your head, that's breaking out.
